mdRecord.dcterms:title: Alapaha, the squaw, or, The renegades of the border / [translated] by Francis Johnson
Alapaha the squaw
Gerstäcker, Friedrich, 1816-1872. Regulatoren in Arkansas. 1-12 Kapitel. 1870
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Gerstäcker, Friedrich, 1816-1872
Johnson, Francis, 1837-1908
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Series statement also given as: Second series, no. 23.
Translation of: Die Regulatoren in Arkansas (chapters 1-12)
Translation completed by: The border bandits, or The horse-thief's trail (chapters 13-25) and Assowaum, the Avenger, or The destroyer's doom (chapters 26-39)
At foot of wrapper title: Powers & Brown Paper Co., Springfield.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Original pictorial orange wrappers.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Gift of C.W. Barrett.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Dime novels
